name: singingbirds
short_description: Singing Birds is a light-wight, Foobar2000 like media player with the MEncoder library built-in for maximum file support and a powerful DSP system for excellent listening! Singing Birds can be as simply or as complex as you wish. The UI is laid out intuitively and is easy to customize and make your own. The plugin system allows for the ability to add new features without having to update the entire application or and entire library! Singing Birds also comes pre-packaged with ProjectM, Milkdrop 2, and 2 completely new visualizations to make your music move!
summary: A light-wieght audio player for Linux, Windows, and Mac
